title: 3 Great Energy Dividend Stocks That Aren't MLPs
text:
3 Great Energy Dividend Stocks That Aren't MLPs Oct 11, 2015 
Getting a pile of Schedule K-1 forms at tax time can be daunting. Here are three non-MLP dividend stocks. Source: IRS. Master limited partnerships, or MLPs, can be great income investments. MLPs benefit from a specific structure that's very tax efficient, since they pay no income tax at all. This is very different from a more traditional corporation, which pays tax on its … ( continue reading ) Energy Press Releases Get Breaking Energy Technology News by Email. It's free. Submit
